description:
Admiral Hayase led a distinguished career in the Rim Pac Alliance Force and subsequently the UN Navy, but the early death of his wife left him with only her daughter http://anidb.net/ch7652 [Misa] in his private life. Although highly protective of her, he encouraged her early military schooling and later rise in the UN Spacy.
Source: http://macross.anime.net/wiki/Takashi_Hayase
name: Hayase Takashi
